overview:
Matthew Taylor is an online marketing specialist currently serving as President and Founder of Bluewire Media and Director of Online Marketing & Business Develoment of eCampus.com.

Matthew’s first startup was Bluewire Media, an online design and development company focused on solutions for the brick and mortar. In 2009, Matthew sitched the company’s focus to online marketing strategies including SEM and Affiliate Management providing outsourced solutions for many large scale clients nationwide. Matthew joined online textbook retailer eCampus.com in 2007 as the Affiliate Program Manager and later as Online Marketing Manager. Currently he serves as the Director of Online Marketing and Business Development for eCampus and their respective brands. He received is B.A. in Art Studio - New Media with a minor in Marketing from the University of Kentucky in 2004.

relationships.title: Director of Online Marketing and Business Development
